participant_1.background:
I collect guitar picks and guitar strings to use in my music.
My parents are supportive of my career as a party planner, but they are worried about me being lonely.
i just bought my first car.

i want to own a house on a beach.

content.text: Hey there! I'm happy to meet you. What do you do for fun?
I love to travel and meet new people. I've been all over the world and I've made so many friends.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to travel but I've never had the chance.
You should definitely go! It's the best way to experience new cultures and meet new people.
I know, I know. I'll try to make it happen one day.
Good! I bet you'd have a lot of fun.
Thanks! I hope so too.
What do you do for work?
I'm a party planner. I love planning events and making people happy.
That sounds like a really fun job!
It is! I get to work with a lot of creative people and I get to see my work come to life.
That's awesome! I'm glad you like your job.
Thanks! I do. What do you do for work?
I'm a dog groomer. I love working with dogs and making them look their best.
That sounds like a really fun job too!
It is! I get to spend my days with dogs and I get to help people take care of their pets.
That's awesome! I'm glad you like your job.
Thanks! I do.
What's your favorite part of your job?
My favorite part of my job is getting to meet new people and learn about their pets. I also love seeing the dogs' faces when they see how good they look after I've groomed them.
That sounds like a really rewarding job!
It is! I love making people happy and I love working with dogs.
That's awesome! I'm glad you like your job.
